channel.title: Rprogramming on Science and Physiotherapy
channel.description: Recent content in Rprogramming on Science and Physiotherapy

item.title: Join by rows
item.description: In a recent project I find myself often in the situation to deal with similar but not equal datasets. I am working with the German Hospital Registers for the years since 2005 and there is a dataset for each year. Some of them share the same information stored in columns and I had to combine them in a single dataframe. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.
